issue.message: This declaration is opt-in and its usage should be marked with `@androidx.benchmark.perfetto.ExperimentalPerfettoTraceProcessorApi` or `@OptIn(markerClass = androidx.benchmark.perfetto.ExperimentalPerfettoTraceProcessorApi.class)`
This declaration is opt-in and its usage should be marked with `@androidx.benchmark.macro.ExperimentalMetricApi` or `@OptIn(markerClass = androidx.benchmark.macro.ExperimentalMetricApi.class)`
